topic.title: RSA private key, 2048-bit Chinese Remainder Theorem

titlealts.navtitle: RSA private key, 2048-bit Chinese Remainder Theorem
titlealts.searchtitle: (): RSA private key, 2048-bit Chinese Remainder Theorem

topic.shortdesc: View the RSA private key token, 2048-bit Chinese Remainder Theorem (X'05'). This is an asymmetric key token.

keywords.indexterm: RSA private key2048-bit Chinese Remainder Theorem

table.title: RSA private key, 2048-bit Chinese Remainder Theorem format section (X'05')

desc.p: RSA private key, 2048-bit Chinese-Remainder Theorem format section (X'05')

row.entry:
X'05', section identifier, RSA private key, 2048-bit maximum CRT (replaced by RSA-CRT) format
This section type is no longer created by .
Section length in bytes (76 + ppp + qqq + rrr + sss + ttt + uuu + xxx + nnn).
SHA-1 hash value of the private-key subsection cleartext, offset 28 to the end of the modulus.
Length in bytes of the optionally encrypted secure subsection, or X'0000' if the subsection is not encrypted.
Master-key verification pattern in an internal key-token, else X'0000'.

Key format and security flag byte.
External key-token:
X'40' Unencrypted RSA private-key subsection identifier, Chinese-Remainder Theorem format
Internal key-token:
X'42' Encrypted RSA private-key subsection identifier, Chinese-Remainder Theorem format
All other values are reserved and undefined.
SHA-1 hash of the optional key-name section; if there is no name section, then 20 bytes of X'00'.

Key-usage flag byte.
Key usage:
B'11xx xxxx' Only key unwrapping (KM-ONLY)
B'10xx xxxx' Both signature generation and key unwrapping (KEY-MGMT)
B'01xx xxxx' Undefined
B'00xx xxxx' Undefined
All other bits are reserved and must be zero.

Start of the optionally encrypted subsection.
Private key encryption:
External token: EDE2 process using the double-length transport key
Internal token: EDE3 process using the asymmetric master key.
See .
Length of prime number, p, in bytes: ppp.
Length of prime number, q, in bytes: qqq.
Length of dp, in bytes: rrr.
Length of dq, in bytes: sss.
Length of Ap, in bytes: ttt.
Length of Aq, in bytes: uuu.
Length of modulus, n, in bytes: nnn.
Length of padding field, in bytes: xxx.
X'00' padding of length xxx bytes such that the length from the start of the random number above to the end of the padding field is a multiple of 8 bytes.

End of the optionally encrypted subsection; all of the fields starting with the confounder field and ending with the variable-length pad field are enciphered for key confidentiality when the key-format-and-security flag byte (offset 28) indicates that the private key is enciphered.
Modulus, n. n = pq, where p and q are prime and 2512 â‰¤ n < 22048.
